name: Abhradeep Debnath
tagline: Creating Responsive, User-Friendly web experiences with modern technologies.

about.heading: about me
about.describe: a freelance frontend web developer with a passion for creating sleek, responsive websites and web applications. With expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, I specialize in building user-friendly interfaces that are both visually appealing and highly functional. I utilize Tailwind CSS for efficient, modern design and React Router DOM for smooth navigation in single-page applications. I’m proficient in Git and GitHub for seamless collaboration and version control. Whether you're a business looking to establish an online presence or a team needing frontend support, I’m here to deliver solutions that are fast, reliable, and scalable.

frontendDevelopment.describe: Proficient in creating well-structured, semantic HTML5 code combined with modern, responsive CSS3 layouts. Skilled in using CSS methodologies to ensure web applications are visually appealing and compatible across devices.

A strong command of JavaScript (ES6+), including advanced features like arrow functions, promises, async/await, and modules. Capable of writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code for interactive web pages.
Experienced in building dynamic, high-performance applications with React.js. Proficient in hooks, functional components, and state management, focusing on reusable, efficient components.
Expert in Tailwind CSS, creating custom, responsive, and utility-first designs quickly and efficiently without writing excessive custom CSS. Focused on building sleek, minimal UI components.

coreConceptsTools.describe: Skilled in manipulating the DOM using vanilla JavaScript and React, creating dynamic and interactive user interfaces that enhance the user experience.
Experienced in implementing navigation in single-page applications (SPA) using React Router DOM, managing routes, protected routes, and dynamic URL parameters for a smooth, intuitive user experience.

Proficient in using Git for version control, collaborating on projects via GitHub, branching, merging, and handling pull requests. Strong understanding of efficient version control workflows to track project changes.
Proficient in working with JSON for data exchange between the frontend and backend, handling API responses and structured data.
